channel.title: Data Science Hub for R developers
channel.description: Recent content on Data Science Hub for R developers

item.title: DS with R opened
item.description: Data Science with R is opened enjoy! Dookyung Kim

item.title: Data Science Hub for R Developers
item.description: Purpose of this site: R을 통계프로그램이 아니라 재현가능 연구(Reproducible Research) 및 업무자동화를 위한 개발툴로 활용하며, rmarkdown, shiny 등을 활용한 리포팅, 인터렉티브

item.title: Data Science Hub opened
item.description: Data Science Hub is finally opened I start to develop the course titled “Data Science with R”. At this moment, this is mainly for the Bank of Korea(BOK) staff who are interested in Data Science. However, in the future, I will open this course to the public. Dookyung Kim
Reference and Tips Note: Number Title Notes Slides Readings 1 Useful Tips 2 Useful References

Big Data Analytics with R Note: Date Title Notes Slides Readings Day1 Introduction - Data Science and Big data Analysis - Base R - Git and Github in Rstudio R programming in the Tydiverse way - Data Structure & Tidy Data - Importing data - Data Wrangling with `Dplyr` - Functional Programming with `purrr` - Exercises with consumer price data Day2 Getting data on the web - Intro to Restful API (Euro stat data) - CSV, XML, JSON - Web scraping (Naver API) - Exercise with House trade data High Performance - Parallelization - `feather`, Fast On-Disk Format for Data Frames - Using Database with `RSQLite` - Distributed cluster-computing, `Spark`, with `sparklyr` - Exercise with flight data - Exercise with flight data Day3 Discursion Topics - Reproducible Research with `Rmarkdown` - Data visualization with `ggplot2` - Machine Learning with `H2o` - Text mining Day4 Developing R Applications - Interactive web with `Shiny` - R Package Development - Automate an analytical pipeline
Data Science Tools Note: 간단히 정리 Date Title Notes Slides Readings Day1 Using github Web Scraping Real World Data Science

item.title: Course Schedule
item.description: Date Time Lecture Notes Readings Day1 Session 1 Introduction Session 2 Basic R Session 3 Using github Session 4 Functional Programming Day2 Session 1 Data Structure & Tidy Data Session 2 Data wrangling with dplyr Session 3 Web Scraping Session 4 Shiny and Rmarkdown Day3 Session 1 Parallelization Session 2 Database & SQL Session 3 Bigish Data Day 4 Session 1 SparklyR Session 2 Real World Data Science Topics 소
